org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.search.grid

Class GuidedRandomGridSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.WeightLearningApplication
      • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.search.grid.BaseGridSearch

            • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.search.grid.GuidedRandomGridSearch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelApplication

    public class GuidedRandomGridSearch
extends RandomGridSearch
    Randomly search a some locations and then look around those locations.
